name: Wishiwashi
author: Sanosuke Sakuma
flavor_text: When it’s in trouble, its eyes moisten and begin to shine. The shining light attracts its comrades, and they stand together against their enemies.

abilities.name: Schooling
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch this Pokémon with a Wishiwashi-GX in your hand. Any attached cards, damage counters, Special Conditions, turns in play, and any other effects remain on the new Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sharpshooting
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
